Packages that use Triangle
Package Description
gov.sandia.geotessbuilder  

  • Uses of Triangle in gov.sandia.geotessbuilder

    Methods in gov.sandia.geotessbuilder that return Triangle
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    Triangle Triangle.decIndex()  
    Triangle Tessellation.findTriangle​(Triangle t, double[] u)
    Perform walking triangle search to find the index of the triangle that contains position defined by vector and which has no descendant.
    Triangle Tessellation.findTriangle​(Triangle t, int tessLevel, double[] u)
    Perform walking triangle search to find the index of the triangle that contains position defined by vector and which resides on the specified tessellation level.
    Triangle Tessellation.findTriangle​(Triangle t, int tessLevel, double[] u, double[] c)
    Perform walking triangle search to find the index of the triangle that contains position defined by vector and which has no descendant.
    Triangle Edge.getNeighbor​(Triangle triangle)
    Every Edge is defined by 2 Triangles, one on each side of the Edge.
    Triangle Triangle.getNeighbor​(int i)
    Return a reference to the triangle that is the i'th neighbor of this triangle.
    Triangle[] Triangle.getNeighbors()
    Retrieve the 4 neighbors of this triangle.
    Triangle Triangle.incIndex()  
    Triangle Triangle.mark()
    Increment by one the number of times that mark() has been called.
    Triangle Triangle.mark​(boolean mark)
    Set marked to 0 (false) or 1 (true)
    Triangle Triangle.setIndex​(int index)
    Set the value of index.
    Triangle Triangle.unmark()
    Unmark this triangle.

    Vertex Tessellation.findVertex​(Triangle t, int tessLevel, double[] u, double[] c)
    Search, starting from Triangle t, for a vertex that coincides with supplied unit vector u.

    Retrieve the Edge object shared by this Element and Element otherSide.
